name: Plague Doctor (octonion)
description:
Web Version: https://octonion.itch.io/plague-doctor-web

You are handling the response to a deadly plague. The goal is to minimize the number of fatalities. Be careful, it can spiral out of control very fast. You have a limited budget to spend on containment strategies. 

See the CONTROLS screen for more info about the controls.

TOOLS
  1. Vertical Wall - $300
  2. Horizontal Wall - $300 
  3. Masks - $75 - Decrease the transmission rate.
  4. Tests - $25 - Makes any asymptomatic orange patients show as purple.
  5. Stay at Home - $400
  6. Social Distancing -$250 - Decreases the transmission rate.
KEY
  • Orange - Healthy, but could be incubating or asymptomatic. 
  • Purple - Showing symptoms.
  • Black - Critical condition. When there are many in critical condition, the chance of fatalities skyrockets.
  • Brown - Recovered.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

All of this game was created for the GMTK GameJam 2020, except for the music. The theme is "Out of Control". 

Tools used: Unity,  Aesprite, VSCode, BFXR
